div.p: Expansion based on codesystem ActReason v3.1.0 (CodeSystem)
This value set contains 7 concepts
**Definition:**The patient currently has a medical condition for which the vaccine is contraindicated or for which precaution is warranted.
**Definition:**There was no supply of the product on hand to perform the service.
**Definition:**The patient or their guardian objects to receiving the vaccine.
Client deceased.
**Description:**The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
**Definition:**Therapy has been changed and new prescription issued
**Definition:**Contraindication identified

div.p: Expansion based on codesystem RequestIntent v4.0.1 (CodeSystem)
This value set contains 2 concepts
The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action by a Practitioner.
The request is a suggestion made by someone/something that does not have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act.

value.value: Procedure that is synonymous with those activities such as teaching, demonstration, instruction, explanation, and advice that aim to increase knowledge and skills, change behaviors, assist coping and increase adherence to treatment.

Procedure that is synonymous with those activities such as teaching, demonstration, instruction, explanation, and advice that aim to increase knowledge and skills, change behaviours, assist coping and increase adherence to treatment.
